game.name: Manaclysm
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Manaclysm is a PvP brawler where up to 60 mages wage war across realms fractured by magic. Slay enemy mages to upgrade your mana and spell arsenal. Invite friends to a private game, or hop into ranked matchmaking for some massive brawls!
